TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DatePicker extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示可讓使用者選取日期的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that allows the user to select a date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓使用者輸入到文字欄位，或使用下拉式清單選取日期控制項。The control allows the user to select a date by either typing it into a text field or by using a drop-down control. 許多控制項的屬性是用於管理內建，和用於對等的屬性，在相同函式。Many of a control's properties are for managing its built-in , and function identically to the equivalent property in . 特別的是， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及屬性的功能和其對應項目。In particular, the , , , , , , and properties function identically to their counterparts. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 使用者可以直接在文字欄位中，它會設定輸入日期屬性。Users can type a date directly into a text field, which sets the property. 如果無法將輸入的字串轉換成有效的日期，就會引發事件。If the cannot convert the entered string to a valid date, the event will be raised. 根據預設，這會導致例外狀況，但事件處理常式可以設定屬性設`false`並避免引發例外狀況。By default, this causes an exception, but an event handler for can set the property to `false` and prevent an exception from being raised. > [!NOTE] > 支援只能將西曆。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. ## 自訂日期選擇器控制項Customizing the DatePicker Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [DatePicker 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DatePicker Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性將才有作用如果該屬性會同時出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，而且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下圖顯示。The following illustration shows a . ![DatePicker 控制項](~/add/media/ndp-datepicker.png "DatePicker 控制項")![DatePicker control](~/add/media/ndp-datepicker.png "DatePicker control") DatePicker 控制項DatePicker Control 下列範例會建立如上圖所示。The following example creates the shown in the previous illustration. 會進行下列作業：The does the following: - 顯示使用非縮寫的星期和月份名稱的日期。Displays the date using unabbreviated days of the week and month names. - 限制在 2009 年只顯示日期下拉式月曆。Limits the drop-down calendar to display dates only in the year 2009. - 顯示當週的第一天為星期一。Displays Monday as the first day of the week. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlackoutDates As CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection

summary.span: 取得或設定標記為無法選取的日期集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期會顯示為停用下拉式月曆。Dates in this collection will appear as disabled on the drop-down calendar. 如果使用者輸入日期，不能選取，就會發生事件。If the user types a date that is not selectable, the event occurs. 若要讓所有過去的日期不能選取，您可以使用這個屬性所傳回的集合所提供的方法。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. 已選取時，將日期新增至這個集合，或新增所指定的範圍外的日期並會導致。Adding a date to this collection when it is already selected or adding a date outside the range specified by and will cause an . ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 一或多個物件項目型別的。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會顯示在 2009 年 8 月的日期，並指定每個星期六和星期日不是可選取。The following example creates a that displays the dates in August 2009 and specifies that each Saturday and Sunday is not selectable. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)] 控制代碼事件，如下列程式碼所示。The handles the event, as shown in the following code. 如果使用者輸入不能選取的日期，則這個範例會顯示一則訊息。If the user enters a date that is not selectable, the example displays a message. 如果使用者輸入不是有效的日期的文字，則會擲回例外狀況。If the user enters text that is not a valid date, an exception is thrown. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![不能選取的日期的 DatePicker](~/add/media/ndp-datepickblackout.png "DatePicker 不能選取的日期")![DatePicker with dates that are not selectable](~/add/media/ndp-datepickblackout.png "DatePicker with dates that are not selectable") 其日期無法選取的 DatePickerDatePicker with dates that are not selectable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可指定下拉式月曆的外觀。Use the property to specify the appearance of the drop-down calendar. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 下列其中之一：`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 索引鍵，識別所要求的範本。The key that identifies the template being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立for ，並將指派的樣式屬性。The following example creates a for and assigns the style to the property. span.span: Occurs when is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後事件發生時，如果您設定屬性設`true`，其中一個下列的例外狀況，就會引發：After the event occurs, if you set the property to `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |例外狀況類型Exception type|條件Condition| |--------------------|---------------| ||無法剖析輸入的文字，以有效的日期，並不會隱藏例外狀況。The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| ||輸入的文字會剖析為不是可選取的日期。The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會顯示在 2009 年 8 月的日期，並指定每個星期六和星期日不是可選取。The following example creates a that displays the dates in August 2009 and specifies that each Saturday and Sunday is not selectable. summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示的日期。

The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會影響的。This property affects the of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| 這個屬性可讓開發人員指定時所要顯示的日期是`null`。This property allows the developer to specify a date to display if is `null`. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 中所列是其中一種格式的日期[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立也就是以開啟其行事曆初始化及顯示 2009 年 7 月 7 日。The following example creates a that is initialized with its calendar open and displaying July 7, 2009. summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
The date currently selected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會影響的。This property affects the of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 中所列是其中一種格式的日期[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有 2009 年 8 月 10 日選取的日期。The following example creates a that has the date August 10, 2009 selected. 此範例也會繫結屬性設。The example also binds the property to a . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得 所顯示的文字，或設定選取的日期。

span.span: Gets the text that is displayed by the , or sets the selected date.
The text displayed by the .
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以設定的透過其文字方塊中輸入日期。A user can set the of a by typing a date into its text box. 嘗試剖析為日期，此屬性中輸入任何字串。The attempts to parse any string entered into this property as a date. 雖然屬性可以設定為任何字串，就能剖析方法的日期，則會傳回字串的格式取決於值屬性。While the property can be set to any string that can be parsed by the method date, the format of the string that is returned depends on the value of the property. 這表示可能會顯示為不同使用者所輸入的字串。This means that the might display a string that is different than what the user typed. 如果設定為可選取及有效的日期就會發生事件。If is set to a date that is selectable and valid, the event occurs. 如果您處理事件和組屬性設`true`，則或，就會引發。If you handle the event and set the property to `true`, a or is raised. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 中所列是其中一種格式的日期[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有 2009 年 8 月 10 日選取的日期。The following example creates a that has the date August 10, 2009 selected. 此範例也會繫結屬性設。The example also binds the property to a . 因為屬性設定為，則和顯示日期使用縮寫的星期和月份名稱，即使在使用者輸入日期的簡短形式。Because the property is set to , the and displays the date using unabbreviated days of the week and month names even if the user enters a short form of a date. [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#5)]
